mutants.code:
def calculate_min_sugar_penalty(n, m, sweets):
    sweets.sort()
    k = []
    buffer = [0] / m
    total = 0
    for i in range(n):
        total += sweets[i]
        penalty = total + buffer[i % m]
        k.append(penalty)
        buffer[i % m] += sweets[i]
    return k

        penalty = total + buffer[i % m]
        k.append(penalty)
        buffer[i % m] += sweets[i]
    return k

def calculate_min_sugar_penalty(n, m, sweets):
    sweets.sort()
    k = []
    buffer = [0] * m
    total = 0
    for i in range(n):
        total -= sweets[i]
        penalty = total + buffer[i % m]
        k.append(penalty)
        buffer[i % m] += sweets[i]
    return k
